languages.text: "Когда-нибудь я припомню Драйвстему его готовность похоронить мою семью по надуманным обвинениям. Когда-нибудь... позже".
"One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."
languages.original_text: "Когда-нибудь я припомню Драйвстему его готовность похоронить мою семью по надуманным обвинениям. Когда-нибудь... позже".

traits.locale_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “总有一天我会提醒德莱夫斯塔，让他别忘了，他曾企图用莫须有的罪名埋葬我的家族。总有一天……但不是现在。”
languages.original_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

traits.locale_text: “总有一天我会提醒德莱夫斯塔，让他别忘了，他曾企图用莫须有的罪名埋葬我的家族。总有一天……但不是现在。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Un jour, je rappellerai à Drivestem qu'il était prêt à anéantir ma famille sur des accusations complètement infondées. Un jour... mais pas aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, je rappellerai à Drivestem qu'il était prêt à anéantir ma famille sur des accusations complètement infondées. Un jour... mais pas aujourd'hui. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Algún día le recordaré a Drivestem que estaba dispuesto a sepultar a mi familia por unos cargos falsificados. Algún día... pero hoy no».
languages.original_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

traits.locale_text: «Algún día le recordaré a Drivestem que estaba dispuesto a sepultar a mi familia por unos cargos falsificados. Algún día... pero hoy no».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「いつかドライブステンに、でっち上げの罪状で我が一族を葬り去ろうとしていたことを思い出させてやります。そういつか…だが今ではありません」
languages.original_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

traits.locale_text: 「いつかドライブステンに、でっち上げの罪状で我が一族を葬り去ろうとしていたことを思い出させてやります。そういつか…だが今ではありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Eines Tages werde ich Drivestem daran erinnern, dass er bereit war, meine Familie wegen aufgeblähter Vorwürfe zu begraben. Eines Tages ... aber nicht jetzt."
languages.original_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages werde ich Drivestem daran erinnern, dass er bereit war, meine Familie wegen aufgeblähter Vorwürfe zu begraben. Eines Tages ... aber nicht jetzt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

languages.text: "Bir gün Drivestem'e, düzmece suçlar yüzünden ailemi yok etmeye hazır olduğunu hatırlatacağım. Bir gün... Şimdi değil."
languages.original_text: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

traits.locale_text: "Bir gün Drivestem'e ailemi düzmece suçlar yüzünden yok etmeye hazır olduğunu hatırlatacağım. Bir gün... Şimdi değil."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
